Text:
For all those that care, the aspect ratio for this movie is 4:3. Even though the screen resolution is 962*720, the movie will appear as a full screen with two thick black bars on either side of the film.

That being said, this release is has the largest screen resolution available from any .torrent. The video quality is excellent and the audio is in sync with the video. Thank you uploader.
@vivatpb5776 - completely irrelevant comment, it's a 1939 movie in 4:3 - what do you expect watching it on relatively modern equipment?
